section_title: Increase in limits on loans,  etc.  , to National Enterprise Board, Scottish Development Agency and Welsh Development Agency.
section_text: 1 1 The following enactments, that is to say,  . . . section 13 of the  Scottish Development Agency Act 1975 and section 18 of the  Welsh Development Agency Act 1975 (limits on loans made and capital made available to  . . . the Scottish Development Agency and the Welsh Development Agency and their wholly owned subsidiaries, and guarantees by, and in respect of loans to,  . . . those Agencies and any such subsidiary of the Scottish Development Agency) shall be amended in accordance with the following provisions of this section. 2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  5 In sections  . . . 13 and 18, for the words “wholly owned subsidiaries” and “wholly owned subsidiary”, wherever occurring, there shall be substituted the words  “                subsidiaries              ”  and  “                subsidiary              ”  respectively. 6 In sections  . . .13(5)(b) and 18(5)(b)					(which bring within the relevant limit sums borrowed by a subsidiary of  . . . either of the Agencies only when it was such a subsidiary) for the words “when it was such a subsidiary” there shall be substituted the words  “                (whether or not it was such a subsidiary at the time any such sum was borrowed)              ” . 7 In accordance with the foregoing provisions of this section sections  . . . 13 and 18 shall have effect as set out in the Schedule to this Act.
2 1 This Act may be cited as the Industry Act 1979. 2 The National Enterprise Board (Financial Limit) Order 1978 is hereby revoked.
